org.opentcs.components.kernel.services

接口 TransportOrderService

  • 所有超级接口:
    TCSObjectService
    所有已知子接口:
    InternalTransportOrderService

    public interface TransportOrderService
extends TCSObjectService
    Provides methods concerning TransportOrders and OrderSequences.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      OrderSequence createOrderSequence(OrderSequenceCreationTO to)
      Creates a new order sequence.
      TransportOrder createTransportOrder(TransportOrderCreationTO to)
      Creates a new transport order.
      void markOrderSequenceComplete(TCSObjectReference<OrderSequence> ref)
      Marks an order sequence as complete by setting its complete flag.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.opentcs.components.kernel.services.TCSObjectService

        appendObjectHistoryEntry, fetchObject, fetchObject, fetchObjects, fetchObjects, updateObjectProperty

    • 方法详细资料

      • createOrderSequence

        OrderSequence createOrderSequence(OrderSequenceCreationTO to)
                           throws ObjectUnknownException,
                                  ObjectExistsException,
                                  KernelRuntimeException
        Creates a new order sequence. A new order sequence is created with a generated unique ID and all other attributes taken from the given transfer object. A copy of the newly created order sequence is then returned.
        参数:
        to - Describes the order sequence to be created.
        返回:
        A copy of the newly created order sequence.
        抛出:
        ObjectUnknownException - If any referenced object does not exist.
        ObjectExistsException - If an object with the same name already exists in the model.
        KernelRuntimeException - In case there is an exception executing this method.

      • createTransportOrder

        TransportOrder createTransportOrder(TransportOrderCreationTO to)
                             throws ObjectUnknownException,
                                    ObjectExistsException,
                                    KernelRuntimeException
        Creates a new transport order. A new transport order is created with a generated unique ID and all other attributes taken from the given transfer object. This method also implicitly adds the transport order to its wrapping sequence, if any. A copy of the newly created transport order is then returned.
        参数:
        to - Describes the transport order to be created.
        返回:
        A copy of the newly created transport order.
        抛出:
        ObjectUnknownException - If any referenced object does not exist.
        ObjectExistsException - If an object with the same name already exists in the model.
        KernelRuntimeException - In case there is an exception executing this method.

      • markOrderSequenceComplete

        void markOrderSequenceComplete(TCSObjectReference<OrderSequence> ref)
                        throws ObjectUnknownException,
                               KernelRuntimeException
        Marks an order sequence as complete by setting its complete flag.
        参数:
        ref - A reference to the order sequence to be modified.
        抛出:
        ObjectUnknownException - If the referenced order sequence does not exist.
        KernelRuntimeException - In case there is an exception executing this method.
